snippet: Ms. Heide’s prose and poetry, which included books for girls adjusting to adolescence, mysteries and sports stories, were often enhanced with drawings by famed illustrators.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Heide’s prose and poetry, which included books for girls adjusting to adolescence, mysteries and sports stories, were often enhanced with drawings by famed illustrators.

headline.main: Florence Parry Heide, Children’s Writer and Poet, Dies at 92
